articles.title: Gareon Conley missing time with hip injury
articles.description: Raiders cornerback Gareon Conley only played in two games during his rookie season because of a shin injury, but that didnâ€™t stop Raiders coaches from predicting big things from the first-round pick during the 2018 campaign. For that to happen, Conley will haâ€¦

articles.author: Stephanie Rennane
articles.title: Buying Time
articles.description: Examines the roles of moral hazard and increased liquidity in explaining the relationship between Workers' Compensation benefit levels and injury duration.

articles.title: Bournemouth hit injury-time winner at Burnley
articles.description: Preview followed by live coverage of Sunday's Premier League game between Burnley and Bournemouth.

articles.title: Enter Shaqiri - Swiss snatch injury time winner
articles.description: A thunderous strike by Granit Xhaka and a superb last-minute breakaway goal by Xherdan Shaqiri gave Switzerland a dramatic 2-1 win over Serbia in a swashbuckling World Cup Group E match.

articles.title: Tunisia:Kane Breaks Eagle's Hearts in Injury Time
articles.description: [Premium Times] The eighth penalty call at Russia 2018 almost gave Tunisia a share of the points against England at the Volgograd Arena on Monday; but Harry Kane scored in the last minute of the encounter to give England a great beginning to their World Cup câ€¦

articles.title: Florian Lejeune to miss some time
articles.description: Lejeune could be out for a lengthy amount of time due to injury.

articles.author: Edgar Jones
articles.title: [Perspectives] Moral injury in time of war
articles.description: The word injury derives from the Latin injuria meaning a wrong. Applied to both physical and psychological wounds, it is now used as a label for the impact that a moral and ethical dilemma might have on an individual's wellbeing. Although the term moral injurâ€¦

articles.title: The weirdest sporting injuries of all time
articles.description:
Injury worries are commonplace at a World Cup - but never for a manager.

It is surely one of the more bizarre stories from Russia: Gareth Southgate  dislocating his right shoulder while running near England's World Cup base.

He was making the most of a â€¦

articles.author: Erin Fish
articles.title: Cabrera shouldn't miss time after tweaking elbow
articles.description: NEW YORK -- Mets second baseman Asdrubal Cabrera was removed from Tuesday night's 7-3 loss to the Phillies after re-aggravating his hyperextended left elbow. Cabrera has been playing through the injury for weeks and tweaked it on Tuesday. The injury does not â€¦

articles.author: By Tom Timmermann St. Louis Post-Dispatch
articles.title: Schwartz skates for first time since injury
articles.description: While the time frame for his return remains unknown, injured forward Jaden Schwartz seemed to take a step in the right direction Monday when he skated for the first time since breaking his ankle Dec. 9.

articles.author: RTÃ‰ Sport
articles.title: Klavan secures injury-time winner for Liverpool
articles.description: Centre-back Ragnar Klavan was Liverpool's unlikely match-winner at Burnley as his close-range header in the fourth minute of added time made light of the absence of three of the 'Fab Four'.

articles.title: Batshuayi scores injury-time winner for Dortmund
articles.description: On-loan Chelsea forward Michy Batshuayi climbs off the bench to score a 94th-minute winner as Borussia Dortmund beat Eintracht Frankfurt.

articles.author: The Independent
articles.title: Andy Murray fights injury, and time
articles.description: The crux of his struggles, a persistent hip injury that has plagued him for a number of years now, is clearly taking its toll on a player battling to keep the effects of Father Time at bay.

articles.author: John Taylor
articles.title: Colorado State QB Collin Hill tears left ACL a second time, this time playing hoops
articles.description: Hill started four games in 2016, was projected as the starter prior to injury.
